description: A 35-year-old man was taken to hospital with serious injuries, police say.
title: Eastbourne: Pedestrian injured in hit-and-run crash
title_page: Eastbourne: Pedestrian injured in hit-and-run crash - BBC News
maintext:
Police are appealing for witnesses after a man was seriously injured in a hit-and-run crash.
Emergency services were called to Royal Parade in Eastbourne at about 18:30 GMT on Thursday.
A 35-year-old man was taken to hospital with serious injuries after reports of a car hitting a pedestrian, Sussex Police said.
The vehicle left the scene without stopping and an investigation has been launched to identify and locate those involved, the force said.
